result.arabic_text: وَإِن كَادُواْ لَيَسۡتَفِزُّونَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيُخۡرِجُوكَ مِنۡهَاۖ وَإِذٗا لَّا يَلۡبَثُونَ خِلَٰفَكَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا
result.translation: 76. Waxayna u dhowaadeen inay kaa fiijiyaan arlada si ay kaaga saaraan. markaas ma negaadeen gadaashaa in yar ma’ahee21.
result.footnotes: 21. Hadday saari lahaayeen reer Makkah Nabi Muxammad s.c.w. ma ku sii negaadeen Makkah oo wax badan ma joogeen dunida, balse Alle wuu halaagi lahaa dhammantood. Hijridii Nabiga s.c.w. ee Madiina ma ahayn saarid ay saareen Quraysh, waxayse ahayd Amar Alle uu ku amray. Ummad kasta oo saarta Nabigeeda Alle wuu halaagaa, taasina waa jid soo jireen ah aan marnaba is beddelin.
